Overview[]: Kal is a hot-headed but loyal and caring man who cares about the safety of Hilltop . He is initially loyal to Gregory , but overtime loses respect for him due to Gregory's cowardly nature and instead becomes loyal to Maggie . He is shown to be brave and more than willing to put his life on the line for his community.
Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Kal's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Kal survived the early stages of the outbreak and took residence in a FEMA camp upon where he was later evacuated to a safe-zone named the Hilltop Colony . He settled into the farming community and was subsequently assigned as one of the community's guards alongside Eduardo.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Kal has killed: Justin (Zombified, alongside Maggie ) Possibly a few unnamed Saviors Possibly a few unnamed Whisperers Numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: The casting call for this character used the name John or Greg . [1] Kal is the fourth supporting character to outlive his comic book counterpart, with the first being Ed Peletier , the second being Scott , the third being Tobin , the fifth being Bruce , the sixth being Luke Abrams . For much of the filming period for Season 10, actor James Chen was busy filming for another show, FBI , where he was in a recurring role, leaving him unavailable to film for The Walking Dead . Kal appears in the archival footage shown at the beginning of " Lockdown " as Judith narrates past events of the show to the audience before the episode's story begins.
